---
title: "eINFRA application example"
---

The eINFRA call is a non-competitive grant that can be used to request 50.000 credits and/or 10.000 GPU hours per calendar year per project.

More info about requirements and the application portal can be found [here](https://www.surf.nl/en/research-it/apply-for-access-to-compute-services)

An example eINFRA application for Snellius can be found [here](https://servicedesk.surf.nl/wiki/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=30660193). It illustrates the length and the level of detail of the specification of the project requirements.
